alert.note: Alert for Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 2:25PM EDT until July 29 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Plymouth County in southeastern Massachusetts... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 224 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Scituate, or 7 miles east of Weymouth, moving southeast at 20 mph. The strongest winds should pass through Hingham, Norwell, and Hanover. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Marshfield, Hingham, Scituate, Pembroke, Hanover, Norwell, Hull and Cohasset. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
